channel.title: government on Mark Gingrass Blog
channel.description: Recent content in government on Mark Gingrass Blog

item.title: Job Roles - What do I actually do?
item.description: New Job - New Role At almost all social events, whether on a hike with a group from Meetup or a bar down the street with fellow craft beer drinkers, their is always one question that always comes up. That is, “So what do you do?” I often ask myself that very same question? In this post, I will try to explain my dialy role as an Operations Research Analyst.

item.title: GASP
item.description: GASP Devgin Check out devgin.com for more Event Government Advances in Statistical Programming 2018 Government Advances in Statistical Programming (GASP!) Workshop is a workshop focused on statistical programming for government applications held at the Bureau of Labor Statistics in Washington DC on October 24 to 25, 2018. This event was put on by Washington Statistical Society (WSS) Themes included R, data science applications, statistics, open source software and more.
